productDesc: Brownish pink colored, oval shaped film-coated tablet with a breakline on one surface.
productFormulation: Each film-coated tablet contains: Prulifloxacin………………………600 mg
productIndication: It is indicated in the treatment of infections caused by susceptible organisms, in the following conditions:
productIndicationList: Acute uncomplicated lower urinary tract infections (simple cystitis);
Complicated lower urinary tract infections;
Acute exacerbation of chronic bronchitis.The local antibiotic susceptibility pattern should be considered in the treatment of patients with infectious diseases.
productDoseAdmin:
For adults only, the indicative dosage is as follows:
• Patients with acute uncomplicated lower urinary tract infections (simple cystitis): one 600 mg tablet is sufficient;
• Patients with complicated lower urinary tract infections: one 600 mg tablet once daily for up to a maximum of 10 days of treatment.
• Patients with acute exacerbation of bronchitis: one 600 mg tablet once daily for up to a maximum of 10 days of treatment.

• Patients with complicated lower urinary tract infections: one 600 mg tablet once daily for up to a maximum of 10 days of treatment.
• Patients with acute exacerbation of bronchitis: one 600 mg tablet once daily for up to a maximum of 10 days of treatment.

productDesc: White oblong shaped film-coated tablet having breakline on one side and plain on another side.
productIndication: It is indicated for the treatment of the infections listed below in adults and children from the age of 3months.
productIndicationList: Acute streptococcal tonsilitis and pharyngitis.
Acute bacterial sinusitis
Acute otitis media
Acute exacerbations of chronic bronchitis
Cystitis
Pyelonephritis
Uncomplicated skin adn soft tissues infections
Treatment of early Lyme disease
productDoseAdmin: Please download the complete patient information leaflet for proper dosage and administration.

productFormulation:
Each film-coated tablet contains:
Levofloxacin Hemihydrate equivalent to Levofloxacin…………………500mg
productIndication: It is indicated for the treatment of adults (>18years of age) with mild, moderate and severe infections caused by susceptible strains of the designated microorganism.
productDoseAdmin: Please download the complete patient information leaflet for proper dosage and administration.

productFormulation:
Each film-coated tablet contains:
Levofloxacin Hemihydrate equivalent to Levofloxacin…………………750mg
productIndication: It is indicated for the treatment of adults (>18years of age) with mild, moderate and severe infections caused by susceptible strains of the designated microorganism.
productDoseAdmin: Please download the complete patient information leaflet for proper dosage and administration.

productDesc: White to off white, oblong shaped, film-coated tablets with break line one surface and plain on the other surface.
productIndicationList: Adult Patients
Acute bacterial exacerbations of chronic bronchitis due.
Acute bacterial sinusitis.
Community-acquired pneumonia in patients appropriate for oral therapy.
Pharyngitis/tonsilitis  as an alternative to first-line therapy in individuals who cannot use first-line therapy.
Uncomplicated skin and skin structure infections.
Urethritis and cervicitis
Genital ulcer disease in men
Pediatric Patients
Acute otitis media (>6 months of age)
Community-acquired pneumonia (>6 months of age) in patients appropriate for oral therapy.
Pharyngitis/tonsilitis (>2 years of age) as an alternative to first-line therapy in individuals who cannot use first-line therapy.
productDoseAdmin: Please download the complete patient information leaflet for proper dosage and administration.

productDesc: Yellow colored, flat, circular, bevel edged, uncoated dispersible tablet with a breakline on one surface and plain on the other side.
productFormulation: Each dispersible tablet contains:</br>Clarithromycin……………………125mg (as Clarithromycin Granules (suspension grade)
productIndication: It is indicated in adults and children 12 years and older. Clarithromycin is for treatment of infections caused by susceptible organisms include: Lower respiratory tract infections, Upper respiratory tract infections.
productDoseAdmin: It will be on the water temperature dispersion or directly after taking oral. Adult usual dose each 0.25g, once very 12hours. Serious infections each 0.5g once every 12hours or compliance. Children on a daily 10-15mg per kilogram, two to three hours taking.

productDesc: Orange colored, caplet shaped film-coated tablet with a 'MICRO' engraved on both sides.
productIndication: Treatment of a wide variety of infections caused by susceptible gram-positive and gram-negative aerobes and anaerobes along with protozoa.
productIndicationList: Intra-abdominal injections and diarrhea of mixed bacterial and protozoal origin.
Gynecological infections like PID & prophylaxis in gynecological surgeries.
Surgical prophylaxis and surgical wound  infections.
Orofacial and dental infections
Respiratory tract infections like abscess, aspiration pneumonia and bronchiectasis
Dermatological injections like cellulitis, breast and other cutaneous abscesses, gangrene, diabetic and decubitus ulcers
productDoseAdmin: The usual adult dose is one tablet twice a day orally administration. The doses may be increased in severe infections. The duration of treatment depends upon the type and severity of infection or as prescribed by the physician.

productDesc: White/Red colored '2' size capsule with 'MICRO/MICRO' printed on capsule shells containing white granular powder.
productIndication: It is indicated for several fungal infections.
productDoseAdmin: Please download the complete patient information leaflet for proper dosage and administration.

productDesc: White, circular, biconvex film-coated tablets, plain on both sides.
productIndication: It is used in the management of osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis and ankylosing spondylitis.
productDoseAdmin: For Adults: the recommended dose is 200 mg daily, taken as two separate 100mg doses, one tablet in the morning and one in the evening.

productDesc: White oblong shaped film-coated tablets with a breakline on one surface.
productFormulation:
Each film-coated tablet contains:
Aceclofenac…………………….100 mg
Paracetamol…………………….500 mg
productIndication: Treatment of pain and inflammation in osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, low back pain, dental pain, gynecological pain and inflammatory conditions of ear, nose and throat.
productDoseAdmin: The recommended dose of Aceclofenac and Paracetamol is 1 tablet in the morning and 1 tablet in the evening. Maximum of 2 tablets a day. Or as prescribed by the physician.

productDesc: Pink colored, circular, biconvex, film-coated sustained release tablets plain on both surfaces.
productFormulation:
Each film-coated sustained release tablet contains:
Aceclofenac BP……………………200mg
productIndication: It is indicated for treatment of Osteoarthritis, Rheumatoid arthritis, Spondylitis (the drug of choice), Dental pain, Post operative pain and dysmenorrhea.
productDoseAdmin: The usual dose of Aceclofenac 200mg sustained release is once daily given by mouth. There is no evidence that the dosage of Aceclofenac needs to be modified in patients with mild renal impairment but as with other NSAIDs caution should be exercised. There is some evidence that the dose of Aceclofenac should be reduced in patients with hepatic impairment.

productDesc: Light green colored, oval shaped film-coated tablet
productFormulation:
Each film-coated tablet contains:
Tramadol HCl BP……37.5mg
Paracetamol BP………………325mg
productIndication: Tramadol & Paracetamol indicated for management of moderate to severe pain.
productDoseAdmin: Please download the complete patient information leaflet for proper dosage and administration.

productDesc: Brown colored, circular, biconvex, film-coated tablets with 'MICRO' engraved on one surface and plain on the other surface.
productIndication: Treatment of chronic hyperuricemia in conditions where urate deposition has already occurred (including a history or presence of tophus and/or gouty arthritis). It is indicated in adults.
productDoseAdmin: The recommended oral dose of Febuxostat once daily without regard to food. If serum uric acid is >6mg/dL(357 μmol) after 2-4 weeks, Febuxostat once daily may be considered. It works sufficiently quickly to allow retesting of the serum uric acid after 2 weeks. The therapeutic target is to decrease and maintain serum uric acid below 6mg/dL(357 μmol). Gout flare prophylaxis of at least 6months is recommended.

productDesc: Yellow colored,circular, biconvex, film-coated tablets with 'MICRO' engraved on one surface and plain on the other surface.
productIndication: Treatment of chronic hyperuricemia in conditions where urate deposition has already occurred (including a history or presence of tophus and/or gouty arthritis). It is indicated in adults.
productDoseAdmin: The recommended oral dose of Febuxostat once daily without regard to food. If serum uric acid is >6mg/dL(357 μmol) after 2-4 weeks, Febuxostat once daily may be considered. It works sufficiently quickly to allow retesting of the serum uric acid after 2 weeks. The therapeutic target is to decrease and maintain serum uric acid below 6mg/dL(357 μmol). Gout flare prophylaxis of at least 6months is recommended.

productDesc: Light yellow colored, circular, biconvex delayed release tablets with plain on both surfaces.
productFormulation:
Each enteric-coated tablet contains:
Pantoprazole Sodium Sesquihydrate
equivalent to Pantoprazole………………………………………40 mg
productIndication: Used for short treatment (up to 8 weeks) in the healing and symptomatic relief of erosive esophagitis (damage to the esophagus from stomach acid cause by gastroesophageal reflux disease or GERD). It is also used to treat Zollinger-Ellison Syndrome and other conditions involving excess stomach acid.
productDoseAdmin:
The recommended dose is 20mg Pantoprazole (one tablet) per day.
It might be necessary to take the tablets for 2-3 consecutive days to achieve improvement of symptoms. The treatment should not exceed 4 weeks without consulting a doctor.

productDesc: Hard gelatin capsule of size '0', with white opaque body, printed MICRO on cap and MICRO on body with black ink filled with white to off-white powder.
productFormulation:
Each hard gelatin capsule contains:
Ursodeoxycholic Acid………………………………250mg
productIndication: It is indicated in the treatment of primary biliary cirrhosis (PBC) and for the dissolution of radiolucent gallstones in patients with a functioning gall bladder.
productDoseAdmin: There are no age restrictions on the use of Ursodeoxycholic Acid 250mg hard capsules. For patients is weighing less than 47kg or patients who are unable to swallow it, suspension is available.

productDesc: Yellow colored, flat, circular, bevel edged, uncoated tablet with a breakline on one surface.
productIndication: Domperidone is indicated for the relied of the symptoms of nausea and vomiting
productDoseAdmin: It is used at the lowest effective dose for the shortest duration necessary to control nausea and vomiting. It is recommended to take oral domperidone tablets before meals. It taken after meals, absorption of the drug is somewhat delayed.

productDesc: White, small caplet shaped film coated tablets with score line on one surface and plain on the other surface
productFormulation:
Each film-coated tablet contains:
Cetirizine HCl BP…………………….10mg
productIndication: In adults and pediatric patients 6 year and above:
productIndicationList: Cetirizine is indicated for the relief of symptoms of chronic idiopathic urticaria.
Cetirizine is indicated for the relief of nasal and ocular symptoms of seasonal and perennial allergic rhinitis
productDoseAdmin:
Children aged from 6 to 12 years:
5mg twice daily ( a half tablet twice daily )
Adult and adolescents over 12 years of age:
10mg once daily ( 1 tablet )

productDesc: Orange colored, flat, circular bevel edged uncoated dispersible tablets with a breakline on one surface having pleasant odor.
productIndication: Symptomatic treatment of seasonal and perennial allergic rhinitis or rhinoconjunctivitis. Urticaria.
productDoseAdmin: Allergic rhinitis/ Rhino conjunctivitis: For children 12 years of age and above and adults the following dosage recommendations apply: 10mg ebastine once daily. In cases of severe symptoms the dose may be increased to 20mg ebastine once daily.

productDesc: White, flat, circular, bevel edged uncoated tablets with breakline on one surface.
productIndication: Doxophylline is indicated for the treatment of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ), bronchial asthma and pulmonary disease with spastic bronchial component.
productDoseAdmin:
Elderly Patients: ½ tablet two or three times daily.
Adults: 1 tablet two or three times daily. Or as prescribed by a physician.

productDesc: White smooth cream, free from black particles.
productFormulation:
Each gram of cream contains:
Fusidic Acid (anhydrous)……………..20mg
productIndication: Fusidic Acid is indicated for treatment of skin infections caused by Staphylococci, Streptococci, Cornybacterium minustissimum. Primary skin infections that may be expected to respond to treatment with Fusidic acid applied topically include: impetigo contagiosa, superfacial folliculitis, sycosis barbae, paronychia and erythrasma.
productDoseAdmin: Fusidic Acid cream is applied to the affected area 2-3 times daily generally for a period of 7 days, or as prescribed by physician.

productDesc: Orange colored, oval shaped film-coated tablet with plain on both surfaces.
productFormulation:
Each film-coated extended release tablet contains:
Ranolazine……..500mg
productIndication: Ranolazine is indicated for the treatment of chronic angina. Ranolazine may be used with beta-blockers, nitrates, calcium channel blockers, anti-platelet therapy, lipid-lowering therapy, ACE inhibitors and angiotensin receptor blockers.
productDoseAdmin: Initiate Ranolazine dosing at 500mg twice daily and increase to 1000mg twice daily, as needed, based on clinical symptoms. Take Ranolazine with or withour meals. The maximum recommended daily dose of Ranolazine is 1000mg twice daily.

productDesc: Pale yellow colored capsule shaped film-coated tablet with 'ML' debossed on one side and plain on the other side.
productIndication: Ranolazine  is indicated for the treatment of angina pectoris in patients who have not responded satisfactorily to other anti-anginals and should be given as adjunct to standard therapy.
productDoseAdmin: Initiate Ranolazine dosing at 500mg twice daily and increase to 1000mg twice daily, as needed, based on clinical symptoms. Take Ranolazine with or withour meals. The maximum recommended daily dose of Ranolazine is 1000mg twice daily.

productDesc: White to off white colored, circular shaped, biconvex, uncoated tablets with both faces plain.
productIndication: Cilozol is indicated for the improvement of the maximal and pain-free walking distances in patients with intermittent claudication, who do not have rest pain and who do not have evidence of peripheral tissue necrosis
productDoseAdmin: The recommended dosage of cilostazol is 100mg twice a day. Cilostazol should be taken 30minutes before breakfast and the evening meal. Taking Cilostazol with food has been shown to increase the maximum plasma concentration of Cilozol,which may be associated with an increased frequency of adverse reaction.

productDesc: White to off white colored, circular shaped, biconvex, uncoated tablets with both faces plain.
productIndication: Cilozol is indicated for the improvement of the maximal and pain-free walking distances in patients with intermittent claudication, who do not have rest pain and who do not have evidence of peripheral tissue necrosis
productDoseAdmin: The recommended dosage of cilostazol is 100mg twice a day. Cilostazol should be taken 30minutes before breakfast and the evening meal. productDesc: Light pink colored, circular, biconvex, enteric-coated tablet and plain on the both surface.
productFormulation:
Each enteric-coated tablet contains:
Esomperazole Magnesium Trihydrate equivalent to Esomeprazole……….20mg
productIndication: It is indicated in adults for Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
productIndicationList: Treatment of erosive reflux esophagitis
Long-term management of patients with healed esophagitis to prevent relapse
Symptomatic treatment of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD)
productDoseAdmin: GERD: Treatment of erosive reflux esophagitis: 40mg once daily for 4 weeks. An additional 4 weeks treatment is recommended for patients in whom esophagitis has not healed or who have persistent symptoms.

productDesc: Light pink colored, circular, biconvex, enteric-coated tablet and plain on the both surface.
productFormulation:
Each enteric-coated tablet contains:
Esomperazole Magnesium Trihydrate equivalent to Esomeprazole……….40mg
productIndication: It is indicated in adults for Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
productIndicationList: Treatment of erosive reflux esophagitis
Long-term management of patients with healed esophagitis to prevent relapse
Symptomatic treatment of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD)
productDoseAdmin: GERD: Treatment of erosive reflux esophagitis: 40mg once daily for 4 weeks. An additional 4 weeks treatment is recommended for patients in whom esophagitis has not healed or who have persistent symptoms.

productDesc: Yellow, round, biconvex, film-coated tablets debossed with 'T' above '90' on one face and plain on other surface.
productIndication:
It is indicated for:
Acute Coronary Syndrome or a History of Myocardial Infarction
Coronary Artery Disease but No prior stroke or Myocardial Infarction
Acute Ischemic Stroke or Transient Ischemic Attack (TIA)
productDoseAdmin: Please download the complete patient information leaflet for proper dosage and administration.

productDesc: Pink cap/ Pink body size '1' hard gelatin capsules containing white to off white powder and one yellow colored circular film coated tablet.
productIndication: It is used for the treatment for acute coronary syndrome, myocardial infarction, stroke and angina.
productDoseAdmin: Rosuvastatin and Clopidogrel should be taken once a day or as directed by physician. It may be given at any time of the day, with or without food.

productDesc: White oblong shaped film-coated tablet having breakline on one side and plain on another side.

productDesc: Light yellow colored, round shaped, biconvex, film-coated tablet, debossed with 'C' on one side and '24' on the other side.
productIndication: Symptomatic treatment of urge incontinence and/or increased urinary frequency and urgency as may occur in patients with overeactive bladder syndrome.
productDoseAdmin: The recommended dose is 5mg once daily. If needed, the dose may be increased to 10mg once daily.

generic_name: Losartan Potassium 50 mg Tablet + Amlodipine 5mg Tablets
productDesc: Yellow colored, circular, biconvex, film-coated tablet with MICRO engraved on both surfaces.
productFormulation:
Each film-coated tablet contains
Losartan Potassium USP……….50mg
Amlodipine Besilate BP equivalent to Amlodipine………….5mg
productIndication: For the treatment of mild to moderate hypertension in patients whose blood pressure is not adequately controlled on either monotherapy.
productDoseAdmin: The recommended dosage is one table once a day or as directed by the Physician.

productDesc: Yellow colored, circular, biconvex film-coated tablet with a breakline on one surface.
productFormulation:
Each film-coated tablet contains:
Losartan Potassium USP………………….50mg
Amlodipine Besilate BP equivalent to Amlodipine……………………5mg
productIndication: It is indicated for the treatment of essential hypertension. It may be used alone or in combination with other antihypersentive agents, including diuretics
productDoseAdmin: The usual recommended dose is once daily. No dose adjustment of amlodipine is required upon concomitant administration of thiazide diurectics, beta blockers, and angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors.

productDesc: White to off white, flat, circular, bevel edged, uncoated tablet with a breakline on one surface and plain on other side.
productIndication: Amlodipine is a dihydropyridine calcium channel blocker and it is used in the management of hypertension and prophylaxis of angina pectoris
productDoseAdmin: In hypertension the usual initial dose is 5mg once daily, increased if necessary to 10mg once daily. Similar doses are given in the treatment of stable angina and Prinzmetal's angina. Or as prescribed by the physician.

productDesc: White to off white, flat, circular, bevel edged, uncoated tablet with a breakline on one surface and plain on other side.
productIndication: Amlodipine is a dihydropyridine calcium channel blocker and it is used in the management of hypertension and prophylaxis of angina pectoris
productDoseAdmin: In hypertension the usual initial dose is 5mg once daily, increased if necessary to 10mg once daily. Similar doses are given in the treatment of stable angina and Prinzmetal's angina. Or as prescribed by the physician.

generic_name: Lithium Carbonate Sustained Release 400 mg Tablet
